texto: be prepared by the Project Manager. Similarly, communications from the customer (queries, complaints, compliments) should be routed through the Project Manager. 9 Design and development The project schedule will be presented using an approved scheduling tool. The critical dates are customer acceptance tests (by end October) and system roll-out (before April next year). All of the company standards in the Software Development Manual shall apply. Review and approvals shall be as in the company's Quality Manual. Change requests that affect the functionality as seen by the users must be approved by the company.
